summary: With 6+ years of experience in various industries, I help build scalable FrontEnd for different companies.

experience.description: Building scalable Mobile App in React Native for Neobanking Product
details: Managing the team to build scalable features
Collaborating with the stakeholders and defining the roadmap and OKRs for the project
Building scalable functionalities and handling the overall infrastructure of the mobile app
Improving the overall performance of the app
Defining cadence for alert monitoring for various errors and outages

experience.description: Developing FrontEnd in React Native Web for the application.
details: Built the new Portal in React Native Web for Write once, render anywhere
Integrated many features including Payments, Referral links etc
Improved Performance of reducing the bundle size, optimizing webpack and its features

experience.description: Worked on implementing new features to the mobile app in React Native and Backend in NodeJS.
details: Add features for property view, buy and rent in the mobile app.
Added Integration of Apollo GraphQL to the already existing app.
Improved the performance by upgrading to newer versions and better navigation and coding practices
Integrated api's to the Backend in GraphQL server and Koa

experience.description: Worked on Building FrontEnd in Angular and Backend in NodeJS for various Projects
details: SafeStart - Designed and developed the admin portal for the automated medical webapp by adding various features, webhooks and useful integrations such as email, generate report etc.
MedSpotting - Worked in constructing some of the basic api's in NodeJS and Express
MedMatch - Converted the Hospital management webapp features to mobile app in React Native. Added various features like live tracking, mails etc.
Tiffinity and Tiffinity Consumer - Built the React Native apps for the home made food transport app. Added various features like payments, tracking, mails etc.

experience.description: Designed and developed IBPS model in HTML and CSS.
details: Revamping the UI for the IBPS model
